description: This file defines mock data models and sample lists for the Home screen in an Android TV app. It includes data classes for poster items and row data, along with sample data for trending and recommended content, referencing local drawable resources.

classes.name: PosterItem
classes.description: Data class representing a poster item with an id, title, backdrop resource, and description.

classes.name: RowData
classes.description: Data class representing a row with a title and a list of PosterItems.

classes.name: MockContent
classes.description: Singleton object containing predefined lists of RowData for the mock home screen content.

methods.name: None (data classes and object providers only)
methods.description: This file contains only data class definitions and pre-initialized data objects, no methods are explicitly defined.
